text: unkal penkalil evalenum manakketana ceyal ceytuvit(tatakak kurram cumattappat)tal, atai nirupikka unkaliliruntu nanku perkalai alaiyunkal;. Avarkal atai (meyppatutti) catci kurivittal, (appenkalai) maranam kaipparrum varaiyil allatu avarkalukku allah oru valiyai untakkum varaiyil avarkalai vitukalil tatuttu vaiyunkal
